entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
